abstract: Google got into a tussle with eBay when it invited the auction site’s sellers to a party to promote Google Checkout, a service that competes with eBay’s PayPal.
snippet: Google got into a tussle with eBay when it invited the auction site’s sellers to a party to promote Google Checkout, a service that competes with eBay’s PayPal.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, June 13  It had all the appearances of a marketing stunt gone awry, the Internet industry’s version of a wily playground taunt that quickly escalated into a tense standoff, until the taunter  Google, in this case  blinked.

headline.main: Google Gives Up on Competing With eBay’s Big Boston Party
headline.print_headline: Google Gives Up on Competing With eBay’s Big Boston Party
